home.title: Hi, I'm Marion, full-stack web developer
home.description: Versatile fullstack developer, I turn concepts into code with precision and creativity. I design custom solutions tailored to meet your unique needs, from idea to execution.

lightStep.description: LightStep is an online store dedicated to sports enthusiasts, offering a wide selection of equipment suitable for all disciplines. With an intuitive interface and advanced filters, users can easily find reliable and high-performance products, accompanied by reviews and recommendations for informed choices.

nutribouge.description: Showcase site for a sports coaching and dietetics practice. A comprehensive platform offering individual and group coaching services, with pricing system, contact form, presentation of therapeutic education and dietetics services.

samanarace.description: SamanaRace is an intuitive and responsive booking application that allows users to easily schedule events. It includes a multilingual contact form to facilitate communication, providing real-time feedback on the status of sent messages. The interface is designed to offer a smooth user experience across all devices.

about.title: About
about.description: I'm Marion, a passionate full-stack web developer with a knack for creating dynamic and user-friendly web applications. With expertise in both front-end and back-end technologies, I bring ideas to life through clean code and innovative solutions. Whether it's building responsive websites or developing robust server-side applications, I thrive on turning complex challenges into seamless digital experiences. Let's collaborate to transform your vision into reality!

contact.titlehero: Want to contact me ? Send me a message !
contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Want to create a website? Fill out this form or schedule a meeting with me to discuss it !
contact.callDescription: Let's discuss your project during a 15-minute call
